We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private ChaikinMoneyFlow _cmf;
// In Initialize()
_cmf = CMF(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_cmf.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "CMF Is Ready", _cmf.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "CMF Warm Up Period", _cmf.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "CMF Current", _cmf.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "CMF Name", _cmf.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "CMF Samples", _cmf.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.cmf = self.CMF(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.cmf.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "CMF Is Ready", self.cmf.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "CMF Warm Up Period", self.cmf.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "CMF Current", self.cmf.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "CMF Name", self.cmf.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "CMF Samples", self.cmf.Samples);
}
